form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: DEPARTMENT OF STATE FOREIGN SERVICE OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF VISA APPLICANTS, FS-398

full_text: PLACE DEPARTMENT OF STATE FOREIGN SERVICE OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA Danubio 80, Mexico City MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF VISA APPLICANTS DATE OF EXAMINATION November 6, 1975 CITY COUNTRY At the request of the American Consul at MEXICO, D.F. MEXICO NAME AGE SEX I certify that on the above date I examined CORTEZ CORTEZ, NICOLAS 60 M I examined specifically for evidence of any of the following conditions: CLASS A: DANGEROUS CONTAGIOUS DISEASES: Chancroid Lymphogranuloma venereum Gonorrhea Syphilis, infectious stage Granuloma. inguinale Tuberculosis, active Leprosy, infectious MENTAL CONDITIONS: Mental retardation Previous occurrence of one or more Mental defect (mental deficiency) attacks of insanity Narcotic drug addiction Insanity Psychopathic personality Chronic alcoholism Sexual deviation (See proviso, sec. 34.7, USPHS Regs.) CLASS B: Physical Defect, Disease, or Disability Serious in Degree or Permanent in Nature Amounting to a Substantial Departure from Normal Physical Well-Being. CLASS C: Minor Conditions. (CHECK NUMBER (1) BELOW OR COMPLETE NUMBER (2)) My examination, including the X-ray and other reports below, revealed: (1) No defect, disease, or disability. (2) Defect, disease, or disability, or previous occurrence of one or more attacks of insanity, as follows (give class - A, B, or C - diagnosis, and pertinent details*): CLASS B - 1) Moderate arterial hypertension, control was advised. 2) Probable latent syphilis, noncommunicable, treated with 2.4 million units of Benzathine Penicillin G. Written instructions given for further recommended treatment. CLASS C - Vision on left eye: 20/40; normal right, no glasses. 11/6/75: 70mm Chest X-ray report No pathology from Dr. GENARO ESCALONA, M.D. Blood serological report REACTIVE RPR CARD TEST, 1 DIL RUTH D. LECHUGA from Dr. Other special report(s) (when needed) from Dr. SIGNATURE OF MEDICA L(TECHNICAL ADVISOR TITLE DATE OF FINAL REPORT MEDICAL TECHNICAL ADVISOR 11/6/75 FORM FS-398 GENARO ESCALONA, M.D. Continue on reverse side if necessary. 7.71
